product.longDescription: Huge yields of medium-size, 3-4 lobed fruits. Has apparent tolerance to blossom drop as nearly every flower produces a pepper. Widely adapted but performs particularly well in cool climates where bell peppers are difficult to grow successfully. Best for early crops and particularly good for pack sales. Avg. 4,900 seeds/oz. Packet: 25 seeds.

value: Extra-early, highly-productive standard well adapted to cool climates.

Ace (F1) Bell Pepper Seed

Product ID:574.53574
Zoom Image

Ace (F1) Bell Pepper Seed

Product ID:574.53574

Huge yields of medium-size, 3-4 lobed fruits. Has apparent tolerance to blossom drop as nearly every flower produces a pepper. Widely adapted but performs particularly well in cool climates where bell peppers are difficult to grow successfully. Best for early crops and particularly good for pack sales. Avg. 4,900 seeds/oz. Packet: 25 seeds.
